titleStmt.title: A true list of the French fleet for the year 1692. Commanded by the Count de Tourville, consisting of two squadrons, the blue and the white, with the number of men and guns. From the copy printed at Paris, by the French king's order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin near the Oxford Arms in Warwick-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois Library.
